com.sun.enterprise.security.ee.authorize

Class EJBPolicyContextDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.enterprise.security.ee.authorize.EJBPolicyContextDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolicyContextDelegate

    @Service(name="EJB")
public class EJBPolicyContextDelegate
extends Object
implements PolicyContextDelegate
    This class is primarily a delegate for PolicyContextHandler related queries But also handles Authorization of WebServiceInvocations

    Kumar
